    • About Wesley Peters


    Real Estate expert in the Baltimore metro for almost a decade. Baltimore native, have worked and lived in all the areas I service. Majority of my business is from referrals and repeat clients, firm believer that a happy client is the best advertisement I can have.

    Pride myself on being available to my clients around the clock, knowing the contract inside and out and being a tough negotiator. As an active Real Estate investor myself, my professional network of partners and resources is personally vetted in my years of experience - lawyers, title companies, inspectors, contractors and lenders.

    Short Sale and Foreclosure expert. I manage a small, personally trained team of Listing/Buyers agents, Transaction Coordinators and Administrators from my office in Columbia.
